official_title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to eliminate the leasing authority of the Securities and Exchange Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) from entering into a lease for general purpose office space except through the General Services Administration (GSA).

titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to eliminate the leasing authority of the Securities and Exchange Commission, and for other purposes.
